pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ caranti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.4: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.5: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.9: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.12: “Yā pana bhikkhunī antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.8: tasmiṃ magge corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.10: tasmiṃ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.14: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.15: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
